front.title: Investment analysis methods

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This guide was assembled for those manufacturers that may not have the resources to maintain staff dedicated to evaluating potential investments. It is an overview of the primary methods used for evaluating investments in manufacturing technologies and is designed to minimize the amount of time and resources needed to understand them.

seriesInfo.name: NIST advanced manufacturing series; NIST AMS
